spec_data.Name: rubygem-clockwork
spec_data.Description:
A scheduler process to replace cron, using a more flexible Ruby syntax running
as a single long-running process.  Inspired by rufus-scheduler and
resque-scheduler.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 11:00:42 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A scheduler process to replace cron
